<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

The visual appearance of a point in e.g. a 2D plot.

## Variants
* `Circle` = 1
* `Diamond` = 2
* `Square` = 3
* `Cross` = 4
* `Plus` = 5
* `Up` = 6
* `Down` = 7
* `Left` = 8
* `Right` = 9
* `Asterisk` = 10
